'My Om Nom' Virtual Pet

'My Om Nom' Virtual Pet — I’ve always wondered why virtual pets didn’t take off like they did in the 90’s. Nevertheless, this looks like Hatch, but with a character that has better brand recognition.

Enjoy your day.
